name: Geo Flight Simulator
description:
🎮Controllers supported | ⌨️WASD movement | 🖥️PC only

✈️Take off from Pirkkala Airport and make virtual flight on the city of Tampere. Map is 17,28 km wide 1:1 Satellite Terrain Data powered by MapBox. Game made with Unity by Oneak | 3D Tower by cvv000 | 3D Plane model by HuNtEr_3DdD | Vectors from Vecteezy

❤️Put in comment if you have a favor place for a new map
